anatomy.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the scientific study of the structure of human or animal bodies
anatomy.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Knowledge of human anatomy is essential to figure drawing.
anatomy.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the structure of a body, or of a part of a body
anatomy.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: the anatomy of the nervous system
anatomy.translation[0].definitions[2].de: your body – often used in a humorous way
anatomy.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: You could see a part of his anatomy that I’d rather not mention.
